title: 88/445/EEC: Council Decision of 25 July 1988 on the transition of the Eurotra programme to the third phase
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 25 July 1988 on the transition of the Eurotra programme to the third phase (88/445/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Eurotra Programme as adopted by Decision 82/752/EEC shall move on to the third phase on 1 July 1988.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1988.
